## Load Packages

1. install.packages("hashmap")


```{r}
testdata <- read.csv(file="data/Kemi.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")

df1<- data.frame(c(testdata[1]), c(testdata[6]))

y <- aggregate(x = df1$Water.level..mm.,
          by = list(df1$Year),
          FUN = mean) 
print(y)

plot(y[,1], y[,2])

```

```{r}
library(hashmap)
```

```{r}
data_Helsinki <- read.csv(file="data/Helsinki.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")

water_level_values = hashmap()

for (i in 1:10){
  temp_d = (data_Helsinki[i,]);
  
  if (H$has_key(temp_d[,1])){
    water_level_values[[temp_d[,1]]] = c(water_level_values[[temp_d[,1]]], temp_d[,6]);
  }
  else{
    water_level_values[[temp_d[,1]]] = temp_d[,6];
  }
}

print(water_level_values$items())

```
